item.title: [BHS4/BHS6/BHS7][Infrastructure ] - Electrical background work
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT May 29, 11:00 - 20:00 UTC

Apr 18, 13:17 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our electrical infrastructure.

Start time : 29/05/2025 11:00 UTC
End time : 29/05/2025 20:00 UTC
Service impact : Some servers might be temporarily unavailable during 20 minutes.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing an electrical maintenance.
The operation is carried out in several steps:
Step 1 : From 11:00 UTC to 11:30 UTC, this step may temporarily affect Availability of servers
Step 2 : From 11:30 UTC to 19:30 UTC
Step 3 : From 19:30 UTC to 20:00 UTC, this step may temporarily affect Availability of servers

Rooms where you may experience unavailability on BHS4 are T04A, T04B and T04C
Rooms where you may experience unavailability on BHS6 are T06B, T06C, T06D, T06E, T06F and T06G
Rooms where you may experience unavailability on BHS7 are B702, B703, B707 and B709

Our technical teams will be mobilized throughout the maintenance to resolve any impact on your services.

We apologize in advance for any inconvenience caused.

item.title: [PAR/MAD][Network] - Backbone Incident Notification - Paris - Madrid Pop
item.description:
Apr 19, 23:29 UTC
Identified - We are currently experiencing an incident affecting our Network offering, which is causing temporary latencies between Paris and Madrid.
Please find the details:
Start time : 19/04/2025 23:02 UTC
Service impact : No impact on production traffic because everything is rerouted elsewhere. Some destination would have more latency .
Root cause : Network equipment issue.
Ongoing actions : Our teams are actively working to resolve the incident and restore services as quickly as possible.
We will keep you informed of developments and the resolution of the incident.

We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [GRA][Network] - Network incident notification
item.description:
Apr 17, 04:04 UTC
Resolved - We would like to inform you that the incident on our network infrastucture on GRA Datacenter has now been resolved.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 17/04/2025 01:34 UTC
End time : 17/04/2025 02:07 UTC
Root Cause : This incident was caused by a network equipment issue during the maintenance https://network.status-ovhcloud.com/incidents/myfn82jp00k5 .

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident.

Apr 17, 02:37 UTC
Identified - We have determined the origin of the incident affecting our network infrastucture on GRA Datacenter.

Here are some supplementary details :
Start time : 17/04/2025 01:34 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Services in our GRA Datacenter are temporarily unavailable
Customers Impact : Customers are temporarily unable to access their Services in our GRA Datacenter
Root Cause : This incident is caused by a network equipment issue during the maintenance https://network.status-ovhcloud.com/incidents/myfn82jp00k5 .
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.
